'''Charlotte''' is a playable {{Pneuma}}-aligned {{Cryo}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

A journalist from [[The Steambird]], Charlotte is always on the prowl for an exclusive scoop. Ever so relentless and indefatigable, she won't stop until she finds out the truth, even if she comes closer to danger.
